ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Has this ever happened to you?? and what can you do when it does
ygData.msgSnippet: One thing I learned is that virtually noone really pays much attention to ooc in Paludal Caverns with all the cussing and KS yelling.  Some people even turn
ygData.messageBody:
One thing I learned is that virtually noone really pays much attention to
ooc in Paludal Caverns with all the cussing and KS yelling. Some people
even turn the ooc off. As for yelling for you to Go Away...either they had
been fighting off others trying to take the camp and didn't pay attention to
your request or they are just the kind of jerks i find a lot of in the game.
Bringing the mobs back to the camp was a bad idea since it might trigger
more mobs on you and them...a move some people use to wipe a group at a camp
then take it from them. Asking ooc they may have not noticed, again might
have turned ooc off, especially if they had a fight going as messages fly by
fast. The only thing you can do is try to take them or run to zone. When
one runs to zone with mobs always best to shout or ooc a train so anyone
near it hears that since in PC most people sit around the Shadow Haven ZL
waiting for a group to open. As for what they will do to you later...most
people I have played with know about the kind of people who constantly do
things like this both intentionaly and unintentionaly. They understand
people will train zone and often if they were not ready they have no way of
shouting train without getting killed themselves. People will listen to
both sides usually. I even group almost daily with one lady who I trained
and killed 3 times in one day.....guess she wanted to make sure she knew
when I ran..lol. Most people forget your name though, all you have to do is
play on..))
